features.featureTitle: Implement a new “Service Areas” section on the landing page (frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx) that matches the structure and Tailwind styling provided by the user’s HTML snippet: section wrapper (py-16 bg-white), container layout, a centered H2 title, and a responsive 2-column grid containing two area cards (Ahmedabad and Gandhinagar) each with a title row and an inner responsive grid list of locality <span> items.

Preserve the exact Service Areas content from the user’s snippet (including Gujarati locality names and the existing parenthetical English descriptors like “(Service Areas)”, “(All Over Ahmedabad)”, and “(All Over Gandhinagar)”), and include the concluding italic note line exactly as provided.

Replace the snippet’s Font Awesome icon usage (<i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt">) with an equivalent icon approach already used in the project (e.g., a lucide-react map/pin icon), while keeping the same visual placement (icon to the left of each city heading). Do not add Font Awesome as a dependency.
